impact.source: Declinin Component Licenses,Declining Target License,Obsolete Component Licenses,Obsolete Target Licenses,Infrequent Component Licenses,Infrequent Target License,Reduced Target License Set

property.name: argument
property.value: There is risk of incompatibility among component licenses

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that the project components have licenses that are incompatible

property.name: argument
property.value: There is risk of incompatibility between component licenses and target license

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that the project components have licenses that are incompatible with the target license

property.name: argument
property.value: There is risk of lack of affinity among licenses

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that arises from the need of maintaining a given corporate licensing scheme. It indicates how this set of components deviates from the desired scheme (specified by the target license)

property.name: argument
property.value: There is risk due to a reduced degree of freedom

property.name: description
property.value: Risk due to the low degree of freedom in the choice of the target license because of the licenses of all components

property.name: argument
property.value: There is the risk of adopting components with not widely used licenses

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that the project includes components released under rare or unusual licenses

property.name: argument
property.value: There is risk of choosing a target license type which is not widely used

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that the selected target licens is rare or unusual

property.name: argument
property.value: There is a risk arisong from the precence of unknown licenses

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that, because of lack of knowledge in relation to the number of components licenses, the rest of the risk analysis is not completely trustable. The model support only 17 licenses. There are more than 70 OSI recognized licenses and an undefined number of non-OSS ones. These 17 covers the majority of the cases but there is an error margin where uncertainty exists. This risk represents this uncertainty

property.name: argument
property.value: There is risk that the usage of the component licenses will decline

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that the project includes components released under declining licenses

property.name: argument
property.value: There is risk that the usage of the target license will decline

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that the selected target license is declining

property.name: argument
property.value: There is risk that the component licenses are obsolete

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that the project includes components released under obsolete licenses. A license is obsolete when at least a greater version of the same license exists. It is “more obsoleted” as the number of subsequent versions is greater

property.name: argument
property.value: There is risk that the target license is obsolete

property.name: description
property.value: Risk that the selected target license is obsolete. A license is obsolete when at least a greater version of the same license exists. It is “more obsoleted” as the number of subsequent versions is greater
